Body: To what extent would a so-called "Proto-World" language (if there ever was such a thing) have affected the languages spoken today? How greatly would such a language have guided the future state of human languages or influenced human language itself? Is it worth even thinking about, being that it is so far away in time that we may not be able to see any consequences or effects?
Title: Would a "Proto-World" language have any long-lasting effect on today's languages?
